targets.rawSql: SELECT "time" FROM water ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT last_eneco_import FROM admin WHERE id = 0 LIMIT 50
SELECT inside_temperature, outside_temperature, heating_power_percentage, "time" FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT inside_temperature, "time" FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT heating_power_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY heating_power_percentage DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT outside_temperature FROM tado ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", humidity_percentage, solar_intensity_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT solar_intensity_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT humidity_percentage FROM tado WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT power_normal_kwh FROM power ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT power_offpeak_kwh FROM power ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", water_m3 FROM water ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT "time", heath_gj FROM heath ORDER BY "time" DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT power_offpeak_kwh, power_normal_kwh, "time" FROM power_hour_usage WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC

select
    min(time)::date as firstDate,
    sum(power_normal_kwh) as normal_kwh,
    sum(power_offpeak_kwh) as offpeak_kwh
    from power_hour_usage
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time), extract(day from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date as firstDate,
    sum(power_normal_kwh) as normal_kwh,
    sum(power_offpeak_kwh) as offpeak_kwh
    from power_hour_usage
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;
SELECT "time", 1000*water_m3 as water FROM water_hour_usage WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC

select
    min(time)::date as firstDate,
    sum(1000*water_m3) as water_m3
    from water_hour_usage
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time), extract(day from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date as firstDate,
    sum(water_m3) as water_m3
    from water_hour_usage
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;
SELECT "time", delta_heath_gj FROM heath_hour_usage WHERE $__timeFilter("time") ORDER BY "time" ASC

select
    min(time)::date as firstDate,
    sum(delta_heath_gj) as heath_gj
    from heath_hour_usage
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time), extract(day from time)
    order by 1;

select
    min(time)::date as firstDate,
    sum(delta_heath_gj) as heath_gj
    from heath_hour_usage
    where $__timeFilter(time)
    group by extract(year from time), extract(month from time)
    order by 1;
SELECT $__timeGroup("time", '1d'), max(power_offpeak_kwh) FROM power WHERE $__timeFilter("time") group by 1 ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup("time", '1d'), max(power_normal_kwh) FROM power WHERE $__timeFilter("time") group by 1 ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup("time", '1d'), max(water_m3) FROM water WHERE $__timeFilter("time") group by 1 ORDER BY "time" ASC
SELECT $__timeGroup(time,'1d') as time, max(heath_gj) FROM heath WHERE $__timeFilter(time) group by 1 order by 1
